jpcap
Class IPPacket

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--jpcap.Packet
        |
        +--jpcap.IPPacket
Direct Known Subclasses:
ICMPPacket, TCPPacket, UDPPacket
public class IPPacket
extends Packet

This class represents an IP packet.

Both IPv4 or v6 packet can be handled by this class.

setIPv4Parameter

public void setIPv4Parameter(int priority,
                             boolean d_flag,
                             boolean t_flag,
                             boolean r_flag,
                             boolean rsv_frag,
                             boolean dont_frag,
                             boolean more_frag,
                             int offset,
                             int ident,
                             int ttl,
                             int protocol,
                             IPAddress src,
                             IPAddress dst)
Sets up the parameters of IPv4
Parameters:
priority - Priority
d_flag,t_flag,r_flag - Delay, Through, Realiability flags
rsv_frag - Reserved fragment flag
dont_frag - Don't fragment flag
more_frag - More fragment flag
offset - Fragment offset
ident - Identification
ttl - Time To Live
protocol - Protocol number
src - Source IP address
dst - Destionation IP address

                             int nxt_hdr,
                             int hop_limit,
                             IPAddress src,
                             IPAddress dst)
Sets up the parameters of IPv6
Parameters:
class - Class
flow_label - Flow label
nxt_hdr - Next header
hop_limit - Hop limit
src - Source IP address
dst - Destionation IP address
